# air - Contract

This is a air contract.

### Quickstart

- `npm run build`

[package]
name = "air"
version = "0.0.1"
authors = ["SIOCODE Llc. <info@siocode.hu>"]
edition = "2021"

[dependencies]
ink = { version = "5.0.0", default-features = false }


[lib]
path = "lib.rs"

[features]
default = ["std"]
std = ["ink/std"]
ink-as-dependency = []
target/

[workspace]

resolver = "1"
members = [
  "src"
]
